text: puok yeahou ti ban niyeay tha dai robsa a l laoh ku kdab chit ( kamnanh) . dai robsa puokke te del kdab chit noh haey puokke trauv ban ke dakbandasa daoysaarte avei del puokke ban niyeay . phtoy towvinh dai teangpir robsa a l laoh baektoulay cheanichch trongbratan tam te trong mean chetnea . haey avei delke ban banhchouh mk aoy anak ( mou ham meat) pi mcheasa robsa anaknoh vea rutte thveu aoy puokke pheakochraen meankar bampean ning brachheang themtiet . haey yeung ban banhchoul pheap chea sa trauv ning kar saabkhpaem knea rveang puokke rhautadl thngai barlok . real pel del puokke ban dotaphleung sangkream laeng a l laoh ban ponlot vea chaol vinh . haey puokke bangk vineasakamm now leu phendei . a l laoh min sraleanh puok del bangk vineasakamm laey
